Title: The Blacklist
Actors: Megan Boone, James Spader, Diego Klattenhoff, Harry Lennix
Plot: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 23 nominations.
